alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Clarendon; Kershaw; Lee; Orangeburg; Sumter (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 09 at 3:44PM EST until January 09 at 5:00PM EST by NWS Columbia
info.description: The National Weather Service in Columbia has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Lee County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Calhoun County in central South Carolina... Clarendon County in central South Carolina... Sumter County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Orangeburg County in central South Carolina... Southeastern Kershaw County in central South Carolina... * Until 500 PM EST. * At 344 PM EST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles northwest of Carolina Sandhills Wildlife Refuge to 8 miles north of Summerton, moving northeast at 55 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Emergency management. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Sumter, Manning, Bishopville, South Sumter, Shaw Air Base, Holly Hill, Summerton, Elloree, Oakland, Santee State Park, Mulberry, Alcolu, Woods Bay State Park, Santee Cooper Regional Airport, Elliott, Lee State Park, Sumter County Airport, Millwood, Poinsett State Park, and Santee. This includes the following highways... Interstate 20 in South Carolina between mile markers 104 and 125. Interstate 26 between mile markers 162 and 169. Interstate 95 between mile markers 85 and 146. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 PM EST for central South Carolina.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Clarendon; Kershaw; Lee; Orangeburg; Sumter
